Health Sciences Colleges at UIC

View Menu

Educating Healthcare Leaders of the Future

In addition to providing high-quality patient care to communities and neighborhoods across the state of Illinois, the academic health enterprise of UI Health incorporates the educational functions of UIC's seven health sciences colleges to better prepare students for future careers in healthcare.

Representing the seven health sciences colleges and their numerous programs and specialties, UI Health has trained thousands of healthcare professionals who practice around the city of Chicago, across the state of Illinois and throughout the United States  - and beyond.

UIC College of Applied Health Sciences

UIC College of Dentistry

The University of Illinois College of Medicine

UIC College of Nursing

UIC College of Pharmacy

UIC School of Public Health

Jane Addams College of Social Work
